general: Drink plenty of water (at least 8 glasses a day).
Eat a balanced diet with fruits, vegetables, proteins, and whole grains.
Avoid processed foods and sugary snacks.
first_trimester: Eat small, frequent meals to reduce nausea.
Include iron-rich foods like beans and spinach.
Avoid raw meat, unpasteurized dairy, and high-mercury fish.
second_trimester: Increase calcium intake with dairy or fortified alternatives.
Include lean proteins like eggs, fish, and legumes.
Eat foods rich in vitamin D and magnesium for bone health.
third_trimester: Increase fiber intake to prevent constipation.
Add healthy fats like avocados and nuts.
Continue iron and protein intake to support babyâ€™s growth.
